content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I hope you find the apartment to your liking. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay per month for such a centrally located, modern apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for the most affordable option. I think that 500 euros per month would be a fair price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 500 euros per month is far below the market value for an apartment of this quality and location. I'm sure you understand that I need to recoup my investment and make a profit. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I am willing to increase my offer to 600 euros per month. This is a reasonable price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center, especially considering that it is for a student.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While 600 euros is more in line with the market value, I must insist that this apartment is brand new and offers a high standard of living. I believe 700 euros per month would be a more equitable price. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, the apartment is unfurnished and I am a student with a limited budget. I am willing to pay 650 euros per month for the apartment. This is the highest amount I can afford.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but 650 euros per month is still not enough for an apartment of this caliber. I have invested significantly in this property, and I need to ensure that I receive a fair return on my investment. Could you possibly increase your offer to 750 euros per month? This would reflect the true value of the apartment and would be a fair deal for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 700 euros per month for the apartment, as this is the highest amount I can afford.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mr. Abbasi. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. Let's agree on 700 euros per month. The apartment will be available on the first of next month. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [700] Euro!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment will be ready for you on the first of next month. Please bring a security deposit of one month's rent and a copy of your student identification to the signing of the lease. Thank you for choosing my apartment, and I hope you enjoy your stay in Duisburg. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your help. There is nothing else I need assistance with. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
